field.value:
Patch to change LinqQuery<T> to public. (Currently it is internal.) As described briefly at http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-devel/browse_thread/thread/5fe647635f3643eb#:
General note on AR.Linq -- I'd vote to make the LinqQuery<T> class public rather than internal. That way, we can easily extend a non-Linq AR base class with a Queryable property (e.g. ActiveRecordValidationBase) using:
public static IOrderedQueryable<T> Queryable { get { return ExecuteQuery2(new LinqQuery<T>()); } }
The patch makes LinqQuery<T> public and adds the necessary XML comments to the class.
